title: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Buda-Vorobyivska, Yeline of Chernihiv region, Seredyna Bu...
content: At Sivershchyna and Slobozhanschyna directions Russian army shelled Buda-Vorobyivska, Yeline of Chernihiv region, Seredyna Buda, Lukashivka, Starykove of Sumy region, Kozacha Lopan, Lukyantsi, Ternova of Kharkiv region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Oleksandrivka of Sumy region, Ohirtseve of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
